column1: Table A-181:  Total (Direct and Indirect) Nitrous Oxide Emissions by State from Livestock Manure Management for 2019 (kt) a
Note:  American bison are maintained entirely on pasture, range, and paddock. Emissions from manure deposited on pasture are included in the Agricultural Soils Management sector.

a  Disaggregated animal type (E.g., Beef on Feedlots or Dairy Heifer animal types) nitrous oxide emissions were not estimated by state for the current (1990 through 2019) Inventory. Disaggregated animal types will be estimated for the next (1990 through 2020) Inventory submission.
